attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having read the Daily Mail today (Thursday) I am disgusted that Cats and Dogs are being 'stuffed' into cages a dozen at a time, where they can barely breathe. They are subjected to torture before being killed for food.  This has to stop. We must stop importing Chinese products until this ends. Our Government must get involved and stop this barbaric treatment from continuing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
